articles.description: US space agency says that better telescopes are discovering more objects and now a better system is predicting their paths

articles.title: Meet the new astronaut candidates for NASA's moon missions - NPR
articles.description: The group of would-be astronauts includes four women and reflects a broad stretch of America, from Alaska to Puerto Rico.
articles.content:
NASA introduced its new astronaut candidate class on Monday the first such group in four years.
Robert Markowitz /NASA-JSC

articles.title: US adults' blood pressure levels increased during the COVID-19 pandemic - Medical Xpress
articles.description: The COVID-19 pandemic is associated with higher blood pressure levels among middle-aged adults across the U.S., according to new research published today in the American Heart Association's flagship journal Circulation.
